mapper.select: select * from fsga_yw_ryb where substring(to_char(cq_gxsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:mm:ss'),0,11)>#{Date}

SELECT ajlxmc as casecategory,ajmc as casename,ajbh as caseno, bjsj as receivedtime,sldwmc as handleunit,slrmc as handlepeson, ajlxmc as casetype,zyaq as casedescription,ajzbrymc as mainperson, ajxbrymc as operationperson,la_lrsj as filingtime from fsga_qx_jz_aj
